tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** *****perfect treatment for dental problems with friendly behaviour is at Anandbagh Super Speciality Dental Hospital Malkajgiri Hyderabad. Dr.SIVA SRINIVAS and his assistants are excellent while treating patients with friendly manned treats perfect correct and finest treatment , and creates confidence in patients who are coming with chronic dental problems. Another most important thing is that after treatment, Dr.Siva Srinivas and his staff takes utmost care after the treatment and re-examine the patients for the perfection and satisfaction of the operation. I thank Dr.Siva Srinivas  his staff members and his assistant doctors for the kind hospitality shown during my visit on 15th December,2023. May God bless you and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited the Doctor for treatment of my teeth problem & my wife together. He is a professional Doctor. Advised  us with correct &  simple treatment. He is  not at all comercial. Will not advise for tooth removal unless it is very necessary. This is my 2nd visit after 8 yrs. He has excellent staff too just like him. His clinic is simply superb with all facilities , safety, neat and clean. I was scared to visit Doctor during Corona time thinking about safety& maintenance inside the Clinic. His new Clinic in Anandbagh is set up with all care & Iam very surprised with the perfection & safety measures taken here. Now confidently continuing the treatment for both of us. - Bhaskar Vishnubhatla, Sitaramnagar. Thanks to Dr. Srinivas.
reply_text:
Thanks a lot for your satisfaction and encouragement.
We will try to upgrade our clinic as per the current situation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent doctor but they need to work on reducing the waiting time. All other things are excellent

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I appreciate for understanding and giving immediate attention for me as I was having severe unbearable pain, we made a call for appointment and went on time and doc was ready to check. Did setup for surgery the very next day, very polite and professional doc had done surgery without even realizing the pain much.. They made sure I stayed there and gave even ice cream so there was no bleeding and then sent me home after the completion and asked to come for checkup again tomm.. As usual my mother knew him from many years time changed but he remained same .Great person and service oriented humanitarian. Very simple, trustworthy, values time and treatment is perfect. Even his staff are amicable, give best service.Do give it a try.
reply_text:
Thank you sir for your valuable feedback
It gives us immense pleasure to serve more with dedication

review: The doctor and the staff are very good the doctor explained the condition of the teeth very nicely without sweet coating.The cost of treatment was informed and I found it very reasonable I will visit the clinic again
